title: Just for me
creator_credit: Lois Tupper, Dee Simpson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Just for Me documents three women’s experiences with fitness and sport: that of a homemaker with children, an office worker who has just moved to the city, and a married school teacher. The film looks at the women before they participate in a sport, as well as during and after the experience.
